title: Cantor Brings Congressional Connections To Wall Street Job
teaser: When House Majority Leader Eric Cantor lost to a primary challenger in June, it was one of the biggest political upsets in years. But Cantor quickly found work with a New York investment bank, which said it was hiring him to provide "strategic guidance."
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
